snippet: Kevin Durant scored 33 points, including a tying 3-pointer late in regulation and foul shots in overtime, to lead the Oklahoma City Thunder past the Washington Wizards.
abstract: Oklahoma City Thunder beats Washington Wizards, 106-105; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant scored 33 points, including a tying 3-pointer late in regulation and foul shots in overtime, to lead the Oklahoma City Thunder past the Washington Wizards.

headline.main: Durant Caps Rally With Win Over Wizards
